d_0_0.line: AHHHHHHHHH!!! HELP ME!!! PLEASE! I’M GONNA DIEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE!

d_0_1.line: I’VE NEVER LIT A BOMB BEFORE. I PANICKED AND THREW THEM.

d_0_2.line: THEY’RE MEANT TO OPEN THE EXIT BUT I THREW THEM ACROSS THE ROOM.

d_0_3.line: PLEASE HELP ME! I’m gonna die… I’m gonna die in the mines… I’M GONNA DIEEEEEE!

choices.line: Just, calm down. I’ll sort it.
